/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly red and white, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. Cars and pedestrians animate the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The image is captured from a low angle, emphasizing the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
